sentence.Network_en: Each studio flat is equipped with a bathroom kitchenette and balcony.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种一居室的寓所都有一个卫生间、一个厨房和一个阳台.

sentence.Network_en: Oh, don't worry. There is a kitchenette in my room.
sentence.Network_cn: 噢! 别担心,我房间附有厨房.

sentence.Network_en: My room had a refrigerator , an air conditioning and even a kitchenette.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的房间有冰箱、调甚至一个小厨房.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 13．-ette小，（商业上）表示假的cigarette（香烟），kitchenette（小厨房），essayette（短论文），storyette（短篇小说），flannette（棉法兰绒），le.
英语前缀后缀表 ... 表形容词, “属于…的” theoretic,energetic 表名词, “小的东西或状态” kitchenette 表名词 “状态” anxiety.

features of this suite include a Jacuzzi , sauna , study room , dining area with a kitchenette and a 590 sqm private roof top landscaped garden with water features .总统套房的主要特征是有一个按摩浴缸，一个桑拿浴室，一个书房，一个餐厅和一个厨房，还有夫人房。
the bathroom is on your left , the kitchenette on the right , equipped with stove and refrigerator .浴室在你的左手边，小厨房在右边，备有炉灶及冰箱。

entry.tran: 小厨房；房间里用作厨房的一角
entry.def: A kitchenette is a small kitchen, or a part of a larger room that is used for cooking.

auth_sentence.content: Each room has a mini kitchenette and a balcony.
auth_sentence.res_content: Each room has a mini kitchenette and a balcony.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Each room has a mini kitchenette and a balcony.

auth_sentence.content: There's also a fully equipped, fitness centre, your very own kitchenette, fireplace, artist supplies and much more for your use.
